questionnaire.title: Massage Therapy Intake Form
questionnaire.description: Please fill out this form to help your massage therapist understand your needs and any concerns.

questions.question: What is the primary reason for your visit today?
Do you have any specific areas of pain or discomfort?
Have you had any recent injuries or surgeries? If yes, please provide details.
Do you have any chronic conditions or ongoing health concerns? (e.g., arthritis, fibromyalgia, etc.)
Are you currently pregnant? If yes, how far along are you?
Do you have any allergies or sensitivities to lotions, oils, or scents?
What type of pressure do you prefer during your massage?
Are there any areas of your body you would like the therapist to avoid?
Do you have any other concerns or requests for your session?
Have you received professional massages before?
